mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mall.mall_tb_trade ( TRADE_ID, TRADE_NO, USER_ID, SHOP_ID, TYPE, TRADE_PRICE, COUPON_PRICE, POSTAGE, `CHANGE`, TRADE_POINTS, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PROVINCE, RECEIVER_CITY, RECEIVER_AREA, RECEIVER_BACK_CODE, RECEIVER_ADDRESS, RECEIVER_ZIP, RECEIVER_TEL, SHIPMENT, CART_ID, CREATE_DATE, STATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{tradeId}, #{tradeNo}, #{userId}, #{shopId}, #{type}, #{tradePrice}, #{couponPrice}, #{postage}, #{change}, #{tradePoints}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverProvince}, #{receiverCity}, #{receiverArea}, #{receiverBackCode}, #{receiverAddress}, #{receiverZip}, #{receiverTel}, #{shipment}, #{cartId}, NOW(), 'U', #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT t.trade_id AS tradeId, t.trade_no AS tradeNo, t.shop_id AS shopId, t.type, t.pay_type AS payType, t.trade_price AS tradePrice, t.coupon_price AS couponPrice, t.postage, t.change, t.receiver_name AS receiverName, t.receiver_province AS receiverProvince, t.receiver_city AS receiverCity, t.receiver_area AS receiverArea, t.receiver_address AS receiverAddress, t.receiver_tel AS receiverTel, t.receiver_remark AS receiverRemark, t.cart_id AS cartId, t.deliver_date AS deliverDate, t.deliver_start_time AS deliverStartTime, t.deliver_end_time AS deliverEndTime, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.modify_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS modifyDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS payDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.send_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS sendDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.sign_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS signDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedback_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedbacked_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackedDate FROM mall.mall_tb_trade t WHERE t.trade_no = #{tradeNo}
AND t.user_id = #{userId}
